summary: This document is an invoice summary from FedEx for shipping charges associated with J Epstein & Co Inc. It details various shipments made in December 2000, including charges for transportation and special handling, with a total amount due of $244.90. The invoice includes multiple entries for different packages sent to various recipients.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated January 8, 2001, and details shipping charges for various packages sent in December 2000.
The total amount due on the invoice is $244.90.
Multiple individuals are mentioned as senders and recipients of packages associated with J Epstein & Co Inc.
The document includes various shipping details such as transportation charges and special handling fees.
There are several references to fuel surcharges applied to the shipping costs.
